column5: Welcome to the HEART of beautiful San Antonio, TX!  Located on the corner of South St. Mary's and E. Cesar Chavez. Minutes from EVERYTHING that Downtown San Antonio has to offer! Well within walking distance to some of the Best Eateries in SOUTH TOWN, you will NOT STARVE!  Enjoy everything that this condo has to offer with access to gym, pool, barbecue pits and river access. Security it tight and your vehicles will be more than safe within the guarded parking garage.  Welcome Home!
column8: The Heart of San Antonio, TX
